mapper.update: UPDATE CT_DAILYPLAN cd SET cd.REV_AVG_SCORE = (SELECT AVG(REV_AVG_SCORE) FROM CT_REV WHERE DAILYPLAN_NO = #{dailyPlanNo:VARCHAR}) ,cd.UPT_NO = #{memberNo:VARCHAR} ,cd.UPT_DTIME = now() WHERE DAILYPLAN_NO = #{dailyPlanNo:VARCHAR};
mapper.select: SELECT rev.REV_NO ,rev.DAILYPLAN_NO ,rev.POST_TP_CD ,rev.SCORE_LOC ,rev.SCORE_AMT ,rev.SCORE_ALL ,rev.SCORE_FACI ,rev.SCORE_SANI ,rev.SCORE_SER ,rev.SCORE_FOOD ,rev.REV_CONTS ,rev.REV_AVG_SCORE ,rev.REG_NO ,mmm.NICK_NM FROM CT_REV rev, MB_MBR_MGMT mmm WHERE rev.REG_NO = mmm.MBR_NO AND DAILYPLAN_NO = #{dailyPlanNo:VARCHAR} ORDER BY rev.REG_DTIME DESC;
